tasks.title: Project Setup and Foundation
tasks.description: Set up the Next.js project with TailwindCSS and basic project structure
tasks.details: Initialize Next.js project with TypeScript, configure TailwindCSS, set up ESLint and Prettier, create basic folder structure for components, pages, and utilities
tasks.testStrategy: Verify Next.js dev server starts, TailwindCSS compiles correctly, and basic routing works

tasks.title: Homepage Design and Layout
tasks.description: Create the main homepage with featured challenges and category navigation
tasks.details: Design and implement homepage with hero section, featured challenges grid, category cards (HTML, CSS, JS), and responsive navigation
tasks.testStrategy: Test responsive design on different screen sizes, verify all links work, check accessibility

tasks.title: Challenge Data Structure
tasks.description: Define the data structure for challenges and create initial challenge content
tasks.details: Create JSON schema for challenges including title, description, difficulty, category, starter code, test cases, and solutions. Create at least 10 challenges per category
tasks.testStrategy: Validate JSON schema, test data loading, ensure all required fields are present

tasks.title: Challenge Listing Page
tasks.description: Create a page to display all challenges with filtering and search
tasks.details: Implement challenge grid/list view with filters by category and difficulty, search functionality, and pagination
tasks.testStrategy: Test filtering works correctly, search finds relevant challenges, pagination handles large datasets

tasks.title: Challenge Detail Page
tasks.description: Create individual challenge pages with problem statement and starter code
tasks.details: Design challenge detail page with problem description, examples, starter code display, and navigation to editor
tasks.testStrategy: Verify all challenge details display correctly, starter code is properly formatted, navigation works

tasks.title: Admin Interface for Challenge Management
tasks.description: Create admin interface to add, edit, and delete challenges
tasks.details: Build admin panel with forms for challenge creation/editing, JSON/Markdown file management, and challenge preview
tasks.testStrategy: Test CRUD operations, validate form inputs, ensure data persistence

tasks.title: Monaco Editor Integration
tasks.description: Integrate Monaco Editor for code editing with syntax highlighting
tasks.details: Set up Monaco Editor with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript language support, configure themes and editor options
tasks.testStrategy: Test syntax highlighting, autocomplete, error detection, and editor performance

tasks.title: Live Preview Pane
tasks.description: Create live preview functionality for HTML/CSS/JS code execution
tasks.details: Implement iframe-based preview pane that updates in real-time as user types, handle HTML/CSS/JS execution safely
tasks.testStrategy: Test live updates, verify code execution safety, check performance with large code blocks

tasks.title: Test Case Execution System
tasks.description: Implement system to run test cases against user code
tasks.details: Create test runner that executes user code against predefined test cases, validate outputs, and provide feedback
tasks.testStrategy: Test various code scenarios, error handling, timeout management, and result validation

tasks.title: Code Reset Functionality
tasks.description: Add reset button to restore starter code template
tasks.details: Implement reset functionality that restores the original starter code when user clicks reset button
tasks.testStrategy: Test reset functionality, verify original code is restored, check user confirmation if needed

tasks.title: Starter Code Templates
tasks.description: Create and manage starter code templates for each challenge
tasks.details: Define starter code templates for different challenge types, ensure they load correctly in editor
tasks.testStrategy: Verify templates load properly, test different challenge types, check code formatting

tasks.title: Search Functionality
tasks.description: Add search bar to find challenges by keyword
tasks.details: Implement search functionality that searches through challenge titles, descriptions, and tags
tasks.testStrategy: Test search accuracy, performance with large datasets, handle special characters and edge cases

tasks.title: Solution Display System
tasks.description: Create system to show official solutions after challenge completion
tasks.details: Implement solution display that shows after user submits code, with proper formatting and explanation
tasks.testStrategy: Test solution display timing, formatting, and user experience flow

tasks.title: Solution Explanations
tasks.description: Add detailed explanations for each challenge solution
tasks.details: Create comprehensive explanations that describe why solutions work, best practices, and alternative approaches
tasks.testStrategy: Review explanation quality, test readability, verify technical accuracy

tasks.title: Solution Comparison View
tasks.description: Create comparison view between user solution and official solution
tasks.details: Implement side-by-side comparison of user code vs official solution with highlighting and analysis
tasks.testStrategy: Test comparison accuracy, UI responsiveness, and user experience

tasks.title: Responsive Design Implementation
tasks.description: Ensure all pages work properly on mobile and tablet devices
tasks.details: Implement responsive design for all components, optimize for touch interactions, test on various devices
tasks.testStrategy: Test on multiple devices and screen sizes, verify touch interactions, check performance

tasks.title: Dark/Light Mode Toggle
tasks.description: Implement theme switching functionality
tasks.details: Add dark/light mode toggle with persistent user preference, update all components for theme support
tasks.testStrategy: Test theme switching, persistence across sessions, verify all components adapt properly

tasks.title: Vercel Deployment Setup
tasks.description: Deploy the application to Vercel
tasks.details: Configure Vercel deployment, set up environment variables, optimize build process, and deploy to production
tasks.testStrategy: Verify deployment success, test all functionality in production environment

tasks.title: CI/CD Pipeline Setup
tasks.description: Set up automated deployment pipeline with GitHub Actions
tasks.details: Create GitHub Actions workflow for automated testing and deployment, configure branch protection rules
tasks.testStrategy: Test CI/CD pipeline, verify automated deployments work correctly

tasks.title: Sentry Error Monitoring Integration
tasks.description: Integrate Sentry for error tracking and monitoring
tasks.details: Set up Sentry SDK, configure error reporting, create error dashboards and alerts
tasks.testStrategy: Test error reporting, verify alerts work, check dashboard functionality

tasks.title: Analytics and Usage Tracking
tasks.description: Implement analytics to track user engagement and challenge completion
tasks.details: Add analytics tracking for page visits, challenge attempts, completion rates, and user behavior patterns
tasks.testStrategy: Verify analytics data collection, test privacy compliance, check data accuracy

tasks.title: Performance Optimization
tasks.description: Optimize application performance and loading times
tasks.details: Implement code splitting, optimize images, add caching strategies, and improve Core Web Vitals
tasks.testStrategy: Measure performance metrics, test loading times, verify optimization improvements

tasks.title: Accessibility Audit and Improvements
tasks.description: Ensure the application meets accessibility standards
tasks.details: Conduct accessibility audit, implement ARIA labels, keyboard navigation, and screen reader support
tasks.testStrategy: Test with screen readers, keyboard navigation, and accessibility tools

tasks.title: Security Review and Implementation
tasks.description: Review and implement security best practices
tasks.details: Conduct security audit, implement CSP headers, sanitize user inputs, and secure code execution
tasks.testStrategy: Run security scans, test input validation, verify code execution safety

tasks.title: Documentation and README
tasks.description: Create comprehensive documentation for the project
tasks.details: Write README with setup instructions, API documentation, contribution guidelines, and deployment guide
tasks.testStrategy: Verify documentation accuracy, test setup instructions, check completeness

tasks.title: Frontend Learning Resources Integration
tasks.description: Integrate comprehensive frontend bookmarks content as a learning resources section
tasks.details: Create a new 'Resources' section with searchable, categorized learning resources. Organize bookmarks into categories (AI Tools, Security, Performance, CSS, JavaScript, React, etc.). Add filtering, search functionality, individual resource pages, and bookmarking features. Integrate with challenge system to link related resources to challenges. Add 'Learning Path' feature that suggests resources based on challenge difficulty.
tasks.testStrategy: Test resource categorization, search functionality, filtering, bookmarking, and integration with challenges. Verify content accuracy and user experience.

tasks.title: Implement 'All Practice Questions' Page (greatfrontend.com/questions inspired)
tasks.description: Create a dedicated page for 'All Practice Questions' similar to greatfrontend.com/questions
tasks.details:
This includes:
- A main content area with a title, subtitle, and description
- Feature highlights (e.g., 'Solved by ex-interviewers', 'Test cases', 'Code in browser')
- A search bar with a 'Sort by' button
- Content tabs for 'Coding', 'System design', and 'Quiz'
- Sub-filters/categories for 'Coding' (e.g., 'JavaScript functions', 'User interface coding', 'Algorithmic coding')
- Display question statistics (e.g., total questions, total hours)
- A list of question cards, each showing title, description, tags (difficulty, type, frameworks), and completion status
- A right sidebar for filtering by 'Topics' (e.g., OOP, Array, React Hooks) and 'Company' (e.g., Google, Amazon)
- Ensure the page is responsive and integrates with existing navigation and styling
tasks.testStrategy: Test responsive design, verify all filters work correctly, ensure search functionality works, test question card interactions

tasks.title: Internal Resource Content Creation
tasks.description: Create internal, self-contained learning resources similar to the JavaScript questions example
tasks.details: Transform some external resources into internal, comprehensive learning content that includes: 1) Structured question formats with multiple choice answers, 2) Detailed explanations and solutions, 3) Code examples and practical exercises, 4) Progressive difficulty levels, 5) Self-assessment capabilities, 6) Integration with the progress tracking system

tasks.title: Learning Progress Tracker with Checklists
tasks.description: Implement a comprehensive learning progress tracking system with checklists for interview preparation
tasks.details: Create a progress tracker that allows users to: 1) Create and manage learning checklists for different topics (JavaScript, React, CSS, etc.), 2) Mark items as completed with progress tracking, 3) View overall learning progress and completion percentages, 4) Filter and organize learning items by category, difficulty, or status, 5) Export progress reports for interview preparation, 6) Set learning goals and track estimated vs actual time spent, 7) Get recommendations for what to learn next based on current progress
tasks.testStrategy: Test checklist creation and management, verify progress tracking accuracy, test filtering and sorting, ensure data persistence, validate progress calculations and recommendations

tasks.title: Comprehensive Study Plans System
tasks.description: Create structured study plans for different time commitments and skill levels
tasks.details: Implement three-tier study plan system: 1) 1-Week Plan (2 hours daily) - Intensive crash course covering fundamentals, 2) 1-Month Plan (6 hours weekly) - Balanced approach with core concepts and practice, 3) 3-Month Plan (3 hours weekly) - Comprehensive preparation with deep dives. Each plan should include: structured learning paths, daily/weekly milestones, progress tracking, recommended resources, practice exercises, and assessment checkpoints. Support both Arabic and English languages.
tasks.testStrategy: Test plan generation, verify milestone tracking, ensure progress calculation accuracy, test multilingual support, validate time estimates and difficulty progression

tasks.title: Interview Preparation Strategy Guides
tasks.description: Create comprehensive preparation guides and strategy resources
tasks.details: Develop strategic preparation resources including: 1) Frontend Interview Playbook - Complete guide to frontend interview preparation, 2) GFE75 - Curated list of 75 essential frontend questions, 3) Blind75 adaptation for frontend - Algorithm and system design questions, 4) Frontend System Design Playbook - Architecture and design patterns. Each guide should include: preparation timelines, topic breakdowns, practice strategies, common pitfalls, success tips, and real interview scenarios. Support both Arabic and English languages.
tasks.testStrategy: Test guide accessibility, verify content accuracy, ensure multilingual support, validate strategy effectiveness, test integration with study plans

tasks.title: GreatFrontend.com Questions Database Integration
tasks.description: Scrape and integrate comprehensive question bank from greatfrontend.com
tasks.details: Use Firecrawl to extract 500+ practice questions from https://www.greatfrontend.com/questions including: question titles, descriptions, difficulty levels, categories (JavaScript functions, User interface coding, Algorithmic coding), frameworks/languages, completion statistics, and company associations. Organize questions by: topics (OOP, Accessibility, React Hooks, etc.), companies (Google, Amazon, Apple, etc.), difficulty levels, and importance. Create structured database with proper categorization and search functionality. Support both Arabic and English translations.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify data extraction accuracy, test categorization system, ensure search functionality, validate multilingual support, test question filtering and sorting
